channel.title: Help
channel.description: all my character files on a server source i downloaded save as .BIN and i cant read binary files its just a bunch of random letters and numbers, how am i supposed to edit char files?

item.title: Help
item.dc:creator: @asa_akira asa akira
item.description:
@asa_akira wrote:

How can I make it where it saves in a regular notepad file…

Read full topic

item.title: Help
item.dc:creator: @Pure_Slay Pure Slay
item.description:
@Pure_Slay wrote:

Either, A. Don’t pack it in binary, or B. Use a reader for the values, since you know exactly what data type they are written as from the save file. Also you could do a gui and have it pack the data afterwards into binary. But really, that is a waste of time. Any modifications you need to do to a player file can be done through commands, or code on execution.

Read full topic
